Factory hired ?Y$value$?W ?Yunskilled workers?W to do simple manual tasks. An ?Yunskilled worker?W provides only ?R$x$?W of a ?Ycraftsman?W output.
Factory hired ?Y$value$?W ?Ymanagers and engineers?W. They multiply factory output by ?G$x$?W.

Throughput is a measure of raw power of a factory. It's measured in ?Gproduction units?W. Throughput drives both consumption of inputs and production of output. The only source of throughput are ?Gemployment units?W generated by ?Yunskilled workers?W and ?Ycraftsmen?W. Technology advancements can increase amount of ?Gproduction units?W generated per worker. Current throughput modifier is ?G$val$?W. Thus, current ?Y$y$?W employment units generate ?Y$x$?W (?G$val$?W of ?Y$y$?W) production units. Essentially, increase of throughput allows capitalists to employ less workers for the same total wage.

In Project Alice factories can access goods only from the local market. It means that in early game some goods are very hard to obtain. To partly compensate for it, there is a ?G$val$?W base multiplier to throughput.
Current technologies and other modifiers provide a throughput multiplier equal to ?G$val$?W

Inputs multiplier is the strongest industry-related multiplier as it doesn't suffer from diminishing returns. On the opposite, the more you stack a source of this multiplier, the stronger it becomes. Current multiplier is equal to ?G$val$?W.
Local competition between capitalists encourages factories to be more efficient and consume only ?G$val$?W of required inputs.
Smaller factories have to be lean and avoid waste to survive, current factory has ?G$val$?W multiplier due to this reason.
Scientific, political and legal priorities of private and national agents aligned to provide this industry with ?G$val$?W input multiplier.
Various technologies and inventions allow this factory to enjoy additional ?G$val$?W input multiplier.
Output multiplier is a strong multiplier but suffers from diminishing returns. Currently this factory has ?G$val$?W output multiplier.
Due to lack of inputs, output of this factory is multiplied by ?R$val$?W.
To achieve full output, factory has to consume special efficiency inputs. Currently it suffers ?R$val$?W multiplier due to inability to do so.
Employed ?Ymanagers and engineers?W provide factory with ?G$val$?W output multiplier.
Various technologies and inventions provide additional ?G$val$?W multiplier.

As this pop is a slave, its growth is divided by ?Y$val$?W.
Pop growth is proportional to the size of the pop times the sum of:
The growth factor ?Y$x$?W, which is the sum of:
The life rating of the province ?Y$x$?W minus the minimum life rating ?Y$y$?W, all times ?Y$val$?W, giving a total ?Y$value$?W popgrowth
A pop growth penalty of ?Y$x$?W is applied due to starvation. Starvation is caused by the pop's life needs fufillment (currently ?Y$y$?W) being less than the starvation limit of ?Y$val$?W

The starvation penalty is computed by first taking the max starvation penalty (?Y$x$?W) and adding it to all growth modifiers (?Y$val$?W), giving the ?Ypenalty scale?W (?Y$y$?W), with a min possible result of of ?Y$x$?W

Then, subtract the starvation limit (?Y$x$?W) from the pops life need fufillment, and divide it by the starvation limit (?Y$x$?W), with a max possible result of 0. This gives the ?Ystarvation factor?W (?Y$y$?W)
Lastly, multiply the ?Ystarvation factor?W (?Y$x$?W) and ?Ypenalty scale?W (?Y$y$?W) to get the net pop growth penalty (?Y$val$?W), which is then added to the rest of the modifiers

$x$ from not having its capital on the same continent as ours
$x$ from our investment in the nation

?GWelcome to Project Alice!?W
Project Alice is an emulation (not a simulator!) of your favourite victorian-era video game, in other words, we tweak some mechanics to make it more easier to understand for newer players, while also making the world more dynamic and entertaining, fixing old bugs (such as with crises) and implementing new quality of life features.
?GNew features!?W
?YGlobe?W: ?GLoved?W by many, ?Rhated?W by some, turn it off if it bothers you!
?YTech queue:?W SHIFT-Right click to add technologies to the tech queue! (Right click to unqueue)
?YDomestic investment:?W Instead of investing on individual projects, do it in one go
?YPerformance:?W The ticks per second (not FPS) are atleast, x10 times faster
?YLinter:?W Get coverage errors and warnings in your mods, catch bugs and typos easily
?YMacro builder:?W Build units with varying compositions using our macro builder
?Y11 new mapmodes:?W Religion, fort, employment, etc
?YBuild in entire country:?W SHIFT Right-click to build in the entire country!
?GControls:?W
?YTAB?W: Open chat window
?YESC?W: Open main menu and settings menu
?YTilde (`)?W or ?YTilde (~)?W: Open console
?GEnjoy the game! =^w^=?W
?YLeft-click?W to select or replace\n?YRight-click?W to remove
?YLeft-click?W select (deselecting everything else)\n?YSHIFT-Left-click?W add to selection
?YRight-click on a province?W partial retreat (?Gcycling/rotation?W) to province
Press ?YCTRL-1?W thru ?YCTRL-9?W to assign/unassign this unit to a control group, which you can then press ?Y1?W thru ?Y9?W to select
